mapper.insert: insert into GHT_SETUP (SETUP_TITLE,SETUP_CONTENTS,SETUP_KEY,SETUP_DESC,REG_DATE,ATTRIB,USE_YN,START_TIME, END_TIME, SETUP_TYPE) values (#{SETUP_TITLE},#{SETUP_CONTENTS},#{SETUP_KEY},#{SETUP_DESC},now(),'10000',#{USE_YN},#{START_TIME},#{END_TIME},#{SETUP_TYPE})
mapper.update: update GHT_SETUP set SETUP_TITLE = #{SETUP_TITLE}, SETUP_CONTENTS = #{SETUP_CONTENTS}, SETUP_KEY = #{SETUP_KEY}, SETUP_DESC = #{SETUP_DESC}, MOD_DATE = now(), USE_YN = #{USE_YN}, START_TIME = #{START_TIME}, END_TIME = #{END_TIME} where SETUP_ID = #{SETUP_ID}
